forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
